title: Milky Dog
body:
TO READ THE REST CLICK HERE
Milky Dog was inspired by something Naomi Gee wrote on twitter, I really liked the hash tag #milkydog and quickly came up with a little comic about it. You can (and should) follow Naomi on twitter @ngun I'm on twitter as well @weflewairplanes

Also, if youâ€™re a Reddit user (or even if you're not) I submitted this there, if you could up vote it I'd be super grateful just CLICK HERE
